Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Requires all goods, except food, sold at retail in state parks, recreational facilities and historic sites to be produced in the United States
Summary: Requires all goods, except food, sold at retail in state parks, recreational facilities and historic sites to be produced in the United States.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Add ยง13.08, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to requiring goods sold at retail at state parks, recreational facilities and historic sites to be produced or manufactured in the United States
